1.png.description: The Robot toy is visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will bring the drone closer and help center the object in the frame.

2.png.description: The Robot toy is clearly visible and centered on top of the cabinet. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The Robot toy is partially visible at the top of the image. Moving up will bring it more into view and help center it in the frame.

4.png.description: The Robot toy is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

5.png.description: The Robot toy is clearly visible and centered in the frame. It appears to be less than 1 meter away, with surface details and edges defined.
